channel.title: Nvidia Investment on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Nvidia Investment on FinanClub

item.title: SOUN
item.description: score:9 Chances: SoundHound AI has shown strong revenue growth of 47% in FY 2023, indicating a positive trajectory for the company. The investment from Nvidia in SoundHound AI reflects confidence in the potential of the AI market and the company’s technology. The global leader in voice artificial intelligence, SoundHound AI, is well positioned to benefit from the growing adoption of AI technologies.
